name: Experiment #532
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 31

4 people wake up in a room. The door is locked. A voice crackles over the loudspeaker.

Can you escape?

Controls:
Tab to cycle through characters.
Click anywhere within the room and the character will move there.
All interactions take place in the right hand window (smallest one). If a character is close to an object and can interact with it you will be presented with the interaction option in this window in a green text.

Tools:
Construct 2 – design, code & animation
Photoshop CS4 & Wacom tablet – Art
SFX – Audacity & Bfxr
